titleStmt.title: Mercies memorial set out in a sermon preached in Paul's church, Novemb. 17, 1644, in memoriall of the great deliverance which England had from antichristian bondage by Queen Elizabeths attaining the crowne/ by William Gouge ...
titleStmt.author: Gouge, William, 1578-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Miller for Ioshua Kirton ...,
